node.text:
For the love of pizza! Make authentic Neapolitan pizza in your backyard. 

For years, pizza pros have said you just can’t make Neapolitan pizza at home. But the game has changed. The new Ooni Karu 16 Multi-Fuel Pizza Oven is the first and only pizza oven to be ‘Recommended for Domestic Use’ by the Associazione Verace Pizza Napoletana (AVPN), the acclaimed international authority on Neapolitan pizza.

That’s a BIG deal! 

The @pizzanapoletanaverace has two purposes: to preserve the authorship of Neapolitan pizza and to teach the world how to achieve true Neapolitan pizza. 

We submitted ourselves to their scrutinizing standards, and we are so pleased with the result. Here’s Antonio Pace, Founder & President of the AVPN, explaining why they recommend Ooni Karu 16! Helping to uphold Neapolitan tradition is a great honor and achievement.

node.title: Ooni x AVPN | Ooni Karu 16 Recommended for Domestic Use

node.text:
New York-based sourdough enthusiast and Ooni Ambassador Christy Alia of @realcleverfood shows off just how easy it is to set up and get the Ooni Karu 16 primed for action. Now she’s ready to make Sicilian scacciata, calzones, and lots of beautiful leopard-spotted pizza in taking advantage of Karu 16’s improved insulation and improved airflow. 

Want the full Karu 16 rundown? Find a complete list of its product features here: https://bit.ly/3pQmGUY

node.title: Ooni Karu 16 Multi-Fuel Pizza Oven Unboxing Series with @realcleverfood

node.text:
From the renowned Frank Pepe Pizzeria Napoletana in New Haven, comes the much-loved White Clam pizza. Thanks to Ooni Ambassador Mike Holman (@pizzainthesac), making this standout recipe at home in your Ooni Pizza Oven is apizza cake! 😉

Watch it again on YouTube: https://bit.ly/3vhS3sT

node.title: How To Make New Haven Style Pizza with @pizzainthesac

node.text:
Make the most of your Dual Sided Grizzler Plate with this succulent sizzling steak fajitas recipe, courtesy of Ooni ambassador James Synowicki of @zimmysnook. No detail is spared in flavour, whether it’s the zingy steak marinade, creamy guacamole dip, or colourful Pico De Gallo to serve. 🔥

Watch it again on YouTube: https://bit.ly/2NTSv0w

node.title: How To Cook With Ooni Cast Iron Cookware

node.text:
The short answer is yes! When it comes to achieving pizza with a crispy base, spotted with colour, it’s all about maintaining the right stone temperature. Ooni Ambassador, @pizzainthesac, explains why stone temperature is so important when it comes to making pizzas in your Ooni oven. 🔥

If you use Celsius, aim for 420°C+
 
Watch it again on YouTube: https://bit.ly/3th0Udm

node.text:
Looking for a new pizza recipe to try in your Ooni oven? Then look no further! Ooni Ambassador, @slicemonger, shows you how to make “The Beezer”, a pizza that reminds him of his homeland of Finland.

Watch it again on YouTube: https://bit.ly/3kVVr8V

node.title: How To Make The Beezer | Pizza Making At Home

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Ooni Pizza Ovens on August 16, 2021 tagging @kingarthurbaking, @oonihq, @thetablelesstraveled, and @muttipomodorousa. May be an image of pizza and indoor.

node.text:
Let’s be honest: If you’re following us, you’re probably pretty interested in pizza. Well American Ooni fans, we have some capital ‘N’ NEWS: From now until midnight on August 30th, we’re running sweepstakes to give away a prize pack from @muttipomodorousa, @kingarthurbaking, @thetablelesstraveled, and of course, Ooni. 

We’re calling it the Ultimate Pizza Party, because, well, how else would you use a year’s supply of Italy’s best-selling canned tomatoes and some of the highest quality ‘00’ flour in the United States? Among those and other things, the lucky winner will receive an Ooni Koda 16, two pizza peels, and three pizza classes with The Table Less Traveled to help hone their craft. To enter, visit the link in bio… and be sure to follow all three of our party pack partners for more delicious content.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Ooni Pizza Ovens in Russo's Mozzarella and Pasta with @oonihq, and @apartment3pizza. May be an image of 3 people, people standing, outdoors and text that says 'SLICE OF KINDNESS SPOTLIGHT Apartment 3 Pizza'.
Photo by Ooni Pizza Ovens in Barcelona, Spain with @oonihq, and @luigi.di.domenico. May be an image of pizza.

node.text:
Our Spain-based Ooni Ambassador, @luigi.di.domenico, always produces the goods using his Ooni Koda 16.

Luigi tells us what the #JoyOfPizza means to him! He loves to teach the art of great pizza, but the real joy comes when he sees the happiness that is created as a result of his tips and recipes. The joy of pizza can mean many things, but one thing’s for sure, pizza can connect us all.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Ooni Pizza Ovens in Glasgow, United Kingdom with @oonihq. May be an image of standing, outdoors and text that says 'SLICE OF KINDNESS SPOTLIGHT PE PEEK Project'.

node.text:
Our Content Production Coordinator, Edith, was taking her daily lunchtime stroll in Glasgow when she stumbled across a pizza stand powered by an Ooni Pro 16. It was run by Glasgow children's charity PEEK, who were busy firing out pizzas for local kids and their families. PEEK works to create enhancement opportunities for children across Scotland through interactive sessions and events — which in this case, meant classes on using the oven and cooking pizzas. Hooray for pizza education! 

Do you know an individual, group, or organization spreading slices of joy in your area? If so, nominate them as part of our Slice of Kindness competition, and they could win a complete Ooni setup! Nominations close on August 23rd, so head to the link in bio and get your submission in while you can.

node.text:
Let’s do some cooking with recipe developer and home chef, @samseats! He shows us the step-by-step guide to making pizza in his Ooni Koda 16 oven. 🍕

#samseats #ooni #oonified #oonipizzaovens #asmr #cooking #howto #pizzamaking #eeeeats #pizzaiolo #neapolitanpizza #incrustwetrust #pizzapizza #ainteasybeingcheesy #joyofpizza #sliceofkindness #outdoorpizzaoven #pizzaoven

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Ooni Pizza Ovens in London, United Kingdom with @oonihq, and @dough_and_behold. May be an image of 2 people and text that says 'SLICE OF KINDNESS SPOTLIGHT BASE_FACE BLSE PIZZA Rich Payne'.

node.text:
​​London-based Ooni Ambassador Rich Payne of @dough_and_behold is no stranger to kindness. On top of being an active and supportive member of the Ooni Community, Rich regularly carries out small acts of kindness. 

During lockdown last year, Rich set out to raise funds for local charity @crusecare who provide bereavement support, which was particularly important during times of isolation. He baked focaccia, sourdough bread, fougasse, brioche, pizzas and auctioned his fresh bakes daily on his Instagram page in exchange for donations to the charity. 

He additionally won an Ooni Gift Card through a charity auction by @henry_the_brave_ but instead donated his prize back so five-year-old Henry could raise an additional £900 to go towards his Neuroblastoma cancer treatment! 

When not operating his own pizza pop-ups, he also helps out his friend's local pizzeria business, @base.face.pizza. Is Rich just the nicest guy ever?! We think so!

Do you know someone who went above and beyond for their local community? Nominations for our Slice of Kindness competition are live until August 23rd. Link in bio!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Ooni Pizza Ovens in Boston Pizza & Restaurant - Astoria, Queens with @serhan_ayhan, @oonihq, and @bostonpizzagram. May be an image of pizza.

node.text:
Serhan Ayhan is a Queens-based pizzaiolo with a particular gift for making Detroit-style pizza. When he’s not making pizzas at his family-owned Boston Pizza in Astoria, Queens, he works closely with @sliceouthunger to help aid their hunger relief efforts. 

Serhan combined poolish and levain starters for the same-day dough on this pizza Margherita, which he cooked using his Ooni Koda 16. The results? Well, they speak for themselves.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Ooni Pizza Ovens in Brooklyn, New York with @oonihq, and @thezareport. May be an image of 1 person, standing and text.

node.text:
This is New York Times-featured pizza pop-up pro and Ooni Ambassador, Miriam Weiskind. 

When the pandemic hit, @thezareport sprung to action. She put up a sign in her building and started baking free pizzas for her neighbors. Word spread, and quickly, in her neighborhood. Miriam baked pies for anyone who lost their job, first responders, essential workers, and generally anyone who was feeling down as a result of the pandemic. She built a community where she could spread love a little further with each pie, and that community is still thriving today.

Know someone like Miriam? Nominations for our Slice of Kindness competition are live until August 23rd. We want to hear about those who have brightened their community with kind gestures during these strange times. Link in bio!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Ooni Pizza Ovens on August 09, 2021 tagging @oonihq, and @basicslice. May be an image of pizza.

node.text:
Margherita Monday: The best day of the week, if we’re being honest. This beauty was created by Norway-based pizzaiolo @basicslice, and baked in the Ooni Koda 16. 

Mads tops his Margherita  the classic way, with San Marzano tomatoes and fior di latte cheese. Post-bake, he finishes his picture-perfect Neapolitan pizza with carefully placed fresh basil. Sometimes simplicity goes a long way.

This pie is part of a seven-day experiment Mads conducted using his Koda 16. He made seven Margheritas over seven days, all from the same batch of dough, to see how the different proof times stack up. 🙌

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Ooni Pizza Ovens in Brooklyn, New York with @shealynsharleen, @oonihq, and @brooklynpizzacrew. May be an image of pizza and text.

node.text:
Here’s a shining example of spreading joy, the wonderful Shealyn Brand Coniglio (@shealynsharleen), a pizza community legend. Once a month, Shealyn and her husband, fellow pizzaiolo Nino Coniglio, make pizzas and bread for their Brooklyn neighbors in Bushwick via socially distanced deliveries to spread positivity on their block. 

A few slices of kindness can go a long way. Thanks for spreading the (pizza) joy!

Know someone who has spread kindness recently? Nominations for our Slice of Kindness competition are live until August 23rd. We want to hear about those who have brightened their community with kind gestures during these strange times. Link in bio!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Ooni Pizza Ovens on August 07, 2021 tagging @oonihq, @pizzanapoletanaverace, and @realcleverfood. May be an image of pizza and outdoors.

node.text:
Our Ooni Ambassadors recently took part in a virtual Neapolitan-style pizza workshop with the Associazione Verace Pizza Napoletana (@pizzanapoletanaverace), the Naples-based organization whose mission is to preserve and teach the world about authentic Neapolitan pizza. 

One of our Ambassadors, New York-based Christy Alia of @realcleverfood, recently revealed her results from the lesson. While Christy usually sticks to sourdough, she sure could appreciate the flavors of a Neapolitan-style pizza, and boy does it look good! That's the beauty of Ooni pizza ovens, you can trial pizza styles from across the globe. Your pizza, your way! 

Christy transformed her 24-hour fermented pizza dough using wood in the new Ooni Karu 16 Multi-Fuel Pizza Oven. The authentic wood-fired tastes of Napoli are achievable wherever you are!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Ooni Pizza Ovens in Russo's Mozzarella and Pasta with @oonihq, and @sliceouthunger.

node.text:
Slice Out Hunger is a volunteer-driven nonprofit that has raised over $1,000,000 to fund hunger relief efforts around the US since 2009. Arguably the epitome of spreading Slices of Kindness. 

Its most recent campaign is a pop-up series at @russosnyc, featuring some of Brooklyn's best pizzaiolos every Saturday, running until August 28th. Proceeds go towards CHiPS (Community Help in Park Slope @chips4thave), a local community soup kitchen and shelter for young homeless mothers and their children. 

This @sliceouthunger pop-up series is proudly powered by Ooni Pizza Ovens. New Yorkers, this is not one to miss! 

Know someone who has spread kindness recently? Nominations for our Slice of Kindness competition are live until August 23rd. We want to hear about those who have brightened their community with kind gestures during these strange times. Link in bio!
